plot: Director Scott Allen Nollen, now living in a rest home, recalls his comic adventures with Jeff "Roo" Nelson, a fumbling high school student and party animal.
title: The Adventures of Roo
plot_es: Director Scott Allen Nollen, now living in a rest home, recalls his comic adventures with Jeff "Roo" Nelson, a fumbling high school student and party animal.
plot_en: Director Scott Allen Nollen, now living in a rest home, recalls his comic adventures with Jeff "Roo" Nelson, a fumbling high school student and party animal.
